title: Stab 6
description: A bunch of articulate teens sit around and deconstruct horror movies until Ghostface kills them one by one. You get what these are about by now right?
quote: I dare you to open the door.
altHero: Lucy Hale talks on a cordless house phone
alt1: Hale talks in the kitchen, holding a knife in her hands
alt2: Hale and Shenae Grimes look frightened
alt3: Grimes texts on a Sidekick mobile phone
alt4: Ghostface holds up a bloody knife
